title: By the King. A proclamation concerning His Majesties gracious pardon, in pursuance of His Majesties former declaration
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated: Given at Our Court at Whitehal, the Fifteenth day of June, in the Twelfth Year of Our Reign, 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
